name: Malerwinkel Hotel

reviews.text: Located in the lush, quiet Bensberg part of Bergisch Gladbach, Hotel Malerwinkel offers a very relaxing stay for both tourists and business travellers.
reviews.title: Romantic hotel with traditional architecture

description: Our charming and privately owned hotel set in historic half-timbered houses in the district of Bensberg, in the heart of Bergisch Gladbach. The ensemble of buildings surrounding the courtyard garden - an oasis that invites you to linger.The 35 rooms and suites of the Malerwinkel hotels are decorated individually and with great attention to detail. Each room has its own special touch.In the original building's rooms from a colorful mix of tradition and modernity. Old wooden beams meet up with style. Sunny room in pastel shades that are decorated in a classical music theme, are located in the renovated building of the former School of Music. The spacious rooms at the House of Artists are inspired by famous painters.Every morning you can enjoy a breakfast buffet of bright winter garden in the main house and enjoy as a relaxing start to the day.
